original_text: The one who speaks on his own authority seeks his own glory; but the one who seeks the glory of him who sent him is true, and in him there is no falsehood.
korean_text: 스스로 말하는 자는 자기 영광만 구하되 보내신 이의 영광을 구하는 자는 참되니 그 속에 불의가 없느니라

sentences.original_text: The one who speaks on his own authority
but the one who seeks the glory of him who sent him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 자기를 보내신 이의 영광을 구하는 자는

sentences.original_text: in him there is no falsehood
